My Portfolio

Play Way Mobile App (In-Progress)

An Activity picking mobile app I'm working on with friends!

Swipe yes or no on different topics/activities to vote on what you should do in your nearby area!

Tech Stack:

>> HTML/CSS

>> JS

>> React Native (Expo)

>> Google Maps API

Things I've Learned

>> React Native functionality (Stack Nav, useAuth, etc.)

>> Google API integration

>> Data storage and database management

>> Backend for mobile application development

Notesy Notetaking App

A note taking and project management app I'm working on!

Add categories for different types of notes, and store your project ideas with names, notes, tech necessary, etc!

Tech Stack:

>> HTML/CSS

>> JS

>> EJS

>> ExpressJS

Things I've Learned

>> Routing to and from different pages using Express as my backend

>> Data storage and database management
